title: Regency Enterprises - Wikipedia
snippet: Therefore, Regency International Pictures became the holding company for all Milchan’s investments and was legally renamed as Regency Enterprises (doing business as Arnon Milchan Enterprises) and two new companies (both 100% held by Regency Enterprises) were established to produce movies: one to do business in the United States and legally named Regency Entertainment (USA), Inc., one to do business overseas and legally named Monarchy Enterprises S.á.r.l. and both known under the umbrella trade name of Regency or New Regency Productions.

title: New Regency Productions, Inc. Company Profile | Los Angeles, California | Competitors, Financials & Contacts - Dun & Bradstreet
snippet: Company Description: Regency Enterprises lords over a kingdom of Hollywood movies. The company's New Regency Production unit produces and distributes movies such as Mr. & Mrs. Smith , Fight Club, and JFK . News Corp.'s Fox Entertainment owns 20% of Regency and distributes the company's ...

title: About | Regency Enterprises
snippet: Yariv Milchan (PRODUCER) is the Chairman and CEO of the Academy Award®-winning New Regency Productions where he oversees the day-to-day management, creative direction, and overall growth strategy of the company.
